     </h1>

            </div>

    <div id="commentslistp2894875" style="display:none; margin:0px 10px;">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10169241">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10169241">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10169241">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           About Citation Styles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10169241">
          <p>
           <strong>
            APA Style
           </strong>
           is typically preferred for psychology, but check with your professor for style requirements and recommendations to be sure.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10169241" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17988009">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17988009">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17988009">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Avoiding Plagiarism
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content17987746">
          <p>
           Plagiarism is the act of using another person's words or ideas without giving him/her proper credit.&nbsp; It is a serious academic offense.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <p>
           The
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.edu/main/aboutus/dean-academic/integrity/">
            Academic Integrity
           </a>
           page defines plagiarism in more detail and provides information about Muhlenberg's Academic Integrity Code.&nbsp; Check out
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.edu/main/aboutus/dean-academic/integrity/plagiarism_defined.html">
            Defining Plagiarism: A Guide for Students
           </a>
           with helpful frequently asked questions.&nbsp;
          </p>
          <p>
           Indiana University's plagiarism tutorial also offers helpful information on understanding and recognizing plagiarism, including an
           <a href="https://www.indiana.edu/~istd/overview.html">
            overview
           </a>
           with basics and recommendations and
           <a href="https://www.indiana.edu/~istd/examples.html">
            examples
           </a>
           <b>
            . &nbsp;
           </b>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17987746" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21446928">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21446928">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21446928">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           APA Style Resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10296051">
          <div id="boxatt10296051" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12518023">
              <b>
               Publication Manual of the American Psychological Association (6th ed.)
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Ready Reference 808.06615 P976m 2010 (Level A)
               <br />
               The authoritative and complete manual for APA Style.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link15730408">
              <a id="link_15730408" href="http://writing.wisc.edu/Handbook/DocAPA.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(15730408,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Citations'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 15730408}); ">
               APA Documentation Guide (University of Wisconsin)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Examples of citation formatting (in-text and reference list) in APA style.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24942538">
              <a id="link_24942538" href="http://apastyle.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24942538,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Citations'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24942538}); ">
               APA Style (American Psychological Association)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Overview of basics re. formatting and citations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24942547">
              <a id="link_24942547" href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/section/2/10/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24942547,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Citations'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24942547}); ">
               APA Style (Purdue Online Writing Lab)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               General orientation to APA Style, plus examples of paper and citation formatting.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12518025">
              <a id="link_12518025" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12518025,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Citations'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12488789}); ">
               Citation Guides (Muhlenberg College)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Examples of citation formatting in APA, Chicago, and MLA styles.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10173092">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10173092">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10173092">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Zotero
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10173092">
          <div id="boxatt10173092" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12373526">
              <a id="link_12373526" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12373526,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Citations'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12373526}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources."  Download instructions and help available on the site.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource, 
                        _st_gid : content_config.gid 
                    });
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
